C

changeKeyColor(String) - Method in class Controller.MainController
 
changeKeyColor(String) - Method in class view.MainView
this method changes the color of the keys
changeKeyColor(String) - Method in class view.PianoKeys
Changes the color of the key (indicated as a parameter) to red which means that it is currently playing.
changePermissionBySongId(int) - Method in class model.SongDAO
This method allows the user to change the privacy of a song (set if the song is public or private) IMPORTANT: If this method wants to be used to rename a song from the user side, first it must be checked that the user has permission to perform the desired action by using the checkUserPermissionsByUserIdAndSongId(int songId, int userId) method
changeRecordButtonToPause() - Method in class Controller.MainController
changes the button in the piano ui to display the pause icon instead of the record icon
changeRecordButtonToPause() - Method in class view.MainView
changes the button in the piano ui to display the pause icon instead of the record icon
changeRecordButtonToRecord() - Method in class Controller.MainController
changes the button in the piano ui to display the record icon instead of the pause icon
changeRecordButtonToRecord() - Method in class view.MainView
changes the button in the piano ui to display the record icon instead of the pause icon
changeToMute() - Method in class Controller.MainController
 
changeToMute() - Method in class view.MainView
Changes the icon to mute in the PianoSongsView
changeToUnmute() - Method in class Controller.MainController
 
changeToUnmute() - Method in class view.MainView
Changes the icon to unmute in the PianoSongsView
checkUserPermissionsByUserIdAndSongId(int, String) - Method in class model.SongDAO
Method used to verify if the user has permission on a specific song
ChooseSongView - Class in view
this class is responsible for creating the view that lets the user choose the song want to play.
ChooseSongView() - Constructor for class view.ChooseSongView
constructs an instance of this class and initializes the buttons, add the images to them so they would be ready to be assigned an action listener.
ChooseSongViewController - Class in Controller
this is the controller to the ChooseSongView, ChooseSongView , and UserSongView it implements an action listener to respond to all the button clicks on these views.
ChooseSongViewController(CommunicationServer, PianoKeysController) - Constructor for class Controller.ChooseSongViewController
 
ClientDedicatedServer - Class in server
ClientDedicatedServer class used for assigning each user a dedicated server for communicating with the mainServer, retrieving their songs, connecting with others, etc.
ClientDedicatedServer(Socket, ArrayList<ClientDedicatedServer>) - Constructor for class server.ClientDedicatedServer
 
CommunicationServer - Class in Server
this class controls the communication with the Server
CommunicationServer(Config) - Constructor for class Server.CommunicationServer
this is the constructor for this class, it creates the socket and initializes the input/output streams.
Config - Class in model
Config class defines the structure of the configuration file.
Config() - Constructor for class model.Config
 
connect() - Method in class model.ConnectorDB
Method that attempts to connect to the database
ConnectorDB - Class in model
Class for connecting to the MYSQL localhost database, where the songs and users will be stored (in the server's case)
ConnectorDB(String, String, String, int) - Constructor for class model.ConnectorDB
Constructor method that initializes de information needed to connect to the database
